name: Match and Crash
description:
Match and Crash is a little 3-way-match puyyle arcade casual game that will test your fruit matching skill and ask you to clear all its stages.

FEATURES:

There are 6 game modes in this game:

1 - Collect the specified number of points

2 - Clear the level of jelly

3 - Clear the level of wooden blocks

4 - Drop all sugar chips

5 - Destroy the specified number of chips

6 - Fill the level with jam


Clear all 45 stages of berries to complete the entire game!
